data.message: All of you realize your internet trolling drake right, like no shade on him but he has change, lyrically, substance wise he's declined since take care but he is capable of unlimited skills plus he's transcended, so even tho Em logically has the best chance to knock drake off, he won't because drake ain't going no where truefully. Hell Joe budden, someone who knows drake personally,  called him out for rapping like the new niggas and selling out but ppl hardly even knew that, why ? BC no one man can erase drake and all that he has done same for em
